EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Stormwind 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(2139) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(985) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(4813) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(957) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1002) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(4762) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(958) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(953) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(963) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(947);

EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Darkshore 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Azeroth && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(109) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(64) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(38) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(151) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(9) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(22) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(153) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(12) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(102);

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Westfall
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Sentinel Hill" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(14);

EasyQuest.Name: Stringy Vulture Meat, Murloc Eye, Goretusk Snout, Okra, Goretusk Liver
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Stringy Vulture Meat") && !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Murloc Eye") && !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Goretusk Snout") && !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Okra") && !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Goretusk Liver");

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Sentinel Hill" || Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Azeroth || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(14) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(399) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(307) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(297) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(199) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(2038) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(385) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(531) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(255) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(301) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(125) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(3741) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(131) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(246) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(122) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(92) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(127) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(150) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(20) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(89) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(124) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(103) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(104) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(155);

EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Darkshore 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Azeroth && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(14) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(399) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(307) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(297) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(199) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(2038) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(385) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(531) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(255) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(301) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(125) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(3741) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(131) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(246) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(122) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(92) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(127) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(150) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(20) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(89) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(124) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(103) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(104) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(155);

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Loch Modan
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Stoutlager Inn" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(255);

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Stoutlager Inn" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(255) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Thelsamar") || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Stoutlager");

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Redridge Mountains
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Lakeshire" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(92) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(127) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(150) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(20);

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 3
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Lakeshire" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(119) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(131) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Lake") || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Lakeshire");

EasyQuest.Name: Spells Level 16 Kalimdor
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(62124) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(7294) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(25780) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(285) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(694) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2565) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2054) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(8102) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(6761) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1966) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5144) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2120) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5118) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(13795) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1495) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(14261) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1066) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(8925) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1430) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(779) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(783) || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass == WoWClass.Warlock || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass == WoWClass.Shaman || Usefuls.ContinentId != (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor;

EasyQuest.Name: Spells Level 16 Azeroth
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId != (int) ContinentId.Azeroth || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass != WoWClass.Warlock && ObjectManager.Me.WowClass != WoWClass.Shaman || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1455) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5697) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(526) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2645) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(325) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(8019) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(57994);

EasyQuest.Name: Learn Riding Night Elf
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Skill.Has(SkillLine.Riding) || ObjectManager.Me.GetMoneyCopper < 10000 || Usefuls.ContinentId != (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor || ObjectManager.Me.PlayerRace != PlayerFactions.NightElf;

EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Stormwind Riding
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport || Skill.Has(SkillLine.Riding) || ObjectManager.Me.GetMoneyCopper < 10000 || Usefuls.ContinentId != (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor || ObjectManager.Me.PlayerRace != PlayerFactions.NightElf;
